atk-s0517a17:2_0: 22. Idāni pahānāvasānāya abhisamayakathāya anantaraṁ pahānākāraṁ dassentena kathitāya
atk-s0517a17:2_1: suttantapubbaṅgamāya vivekakathāya apubbatthānuvaṇṇanā. Tattha suttante tāva ye kecīti
atk-s0517a17:2_2: anavasesapariyādānaṁ. Balakaraṇīyāti ūrubalena bāhubalena kattabbā. Kammantāti dhāvanalaṅghanakasanavapanādīni
atk-s0517a17:2_3: kammāni. Karīyantīti balavantehi karīyanti. Sīlaṁ nissāyāti catupārisuddhisīlaṁ nissayaṁ
atk-s0517a17:2_4: katvā. Bhāvetīti bhinnasīlassa bhāvanābhāvato idha pana lokiyalokuttarā maggabhāvanā
atk-s0517a17:2_5: adhippetāti. Vivekanissitanti tadaṅgavivekaṁ samucchedavivekaṁ nissaraṇavivekaṁ nissitaṁ.
atk-s0517a17:2_6: Vivekoti vivittatā. Ayañhi ariyamaggabhāvanānuyutto yogī vipassanākkhaṇe kiccato
atk-s0517a17:2_7: tadaṅgavivekanissitaṁ, ajjhāsayato nissaraṇavivekanissitaṁ, maggakkhaṇe kiccato samucchedavivekanissitaṁ,
atk-s0517a17:2_8: ārammaṇato nissaraṇavivekanissitaṁ bhāveti. Esa nayo virāganissitādīsu. Vivekoyeva
atk-s0517a17:2_9: hi virajjanaṭṭhena virāgo, nirodhaṭṭhena nirodho, vosajjanaṭṭhena vosaggo. Atha vā
atk-s0517a17:2_10: kilesehi vivittattā viveko, kilesehi virattattā virāgo, kilesānaṁ niruddhattā nirodho,
atk-s0517a17:2_11: kilesānañca pariccattattā vissaṭṭhattā, nibbānecattassa ca vissaṭṭhattā vosaggo.
atk-s0517a17:2_12: Vosaggo pana duvidho pariccāgavosaggo ca pakkhandanavosaggo ca. Tattha pariccāgavosaggoti
atk-s0517a17:2_13: vipassanākkhaṇe tadaṅgavasena, maggakkhaṇe samucchedavasena kilesappahānaṁ. Pakkhandanavosaggoti
atk-s0517a17:2_15: Tadubhayampi imasmiṁ lokiyalokuttaramissake atthavaṇṇanānaye vaṭṭati. Tathā hi ayaṁ
atk-s0517a17:2_16: sammādiṭṭhiādīsu ekeko dhammo yathāvuttena pakārena kilese ca pariccajati, nibbānañca
atk-s0517a17:2_17: pakkhandati. Vosaggapariṇāminti iminā pana sakalena vacanena vosaggatthaṁ pariṇāmitaṁ
atk-s0517a17:2_18: pariṇataṁ, paripaccitaṁ paripakkañcāti vuttaṁ hoti. Ayampi ariyamaggabhāvanānuyutto
atk-s0517a17:2_19: bhikkhu yathā sammādiṭṭhiādīsu ekeko dhammo kilesapariccāgavosaggatthañca nibbānapakkhandanavosaggatthañca
atk-s0517a17:2_20: paripaccati, yathā ca paripakko hoti, tathā naṁ bhāveti.
atk-s0517a17:3_0: 23.Bījagāmabhūtagāmāti ettha mūlabījaṁ khandhabījaṁ aggabījaṁ phaḷubījaṁ bījabījanti
atk-s0517a17:3_1: (pāci. 91) pañcavidhaṁ bījaṁ, bījagāmo nāma bījasamūhoti attho. Tadeva pana sampannanīlaṅkurapātubhāvato
atk-s0517a17:3_2: paṭṭhāya bhūtagāmo nāma, bhūtānaṁ jātānaṁ nibbattamūlanīlaṅkurānaṁ samūhoti attho.
atk-s0517a17:3_3: Devatāpariggahe sati nīlaṅkurakālato pabhuti hotīti tesaṁ devatāsaṅkhātānaṁ bhūtānaṁ
atk-s0517a17:3_4: gāmotipi bhūtagāmoti vadanti. Vuddhinti aṅkurādivasena. Viruḷhinti khandhādivasena.
atk-s0517a17:3_5: Vepullanti pupphādivasena. Dhammesu pana vuddhinti apubbadhammappavattivasena. Viruḷinti
atk-s0517a17:3_7: Vipulattantipi pāṭho. Atha vā etāni tīṇi padāni sīlasamādhipaññāhipi yojenti.
atk-s0517a17:5_1: lokiyaviratisampayuttacitte ca yathāyogaṁ sampayogato ca ārammaṇato ca vattamānāya
atk-s0517a17:5_2: sammādiṭṭhiyā sāmaññalakkhaṇato ekībhūtāya sammādiṭṭhiyā. Vikkhambhanavivekoti vikkhambhanavasena
atk-s0517a17:5_3: dūrīkaraṇavasena viveko. Kesaṁ? Nīvaraṇānaṁ. Tassa paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ bhāvayatotiādi
atk-s0517a17:5_4: vikkhambhanavasena paṭhamajjhānameva vuttaṁ. Tasmiṁ vutte sesajjhānānipi vuttāneva
atk-s0517a17:5_5: honti. Jhānesupi sammādiṭṭhiyā vijjamānattā sammādiṭṭhiyā viveko nāma hoti. Tadaṅgavivekoti
atk-s0517a17:5_6: tena tena vipassanāñāṇaṅgena viveko. Diṭṭhigatānanti diṭṭhivivekassa dukkarattā padhānattā
atk-s0517a17:5_7: ca diṭṭhivivekova vutto. Tasmiṁ vutte niccasaññādivivekopi vuttova hoti. Nibbedhabhāgiyaṁ
atk-s0517a17:5_11: saṅkhāraviveko. Chandajāto hotīti pubbabhāge jātadhammachando hoti. Saddhādhimuttoti
atk-s0517a17:5_12: pubbabhāgeyeva saddhāya adhimutto hoti. Cittañcassa svādhiṭṭhitanti pubbabhāgeyeva
atk-s0517a17:5_13: cittañca assa yogissa suadhiṭṭhitaṁ suṭṭhu patiṭṭhitaṁ hoti. Iti chando saddhā cittanti
atk-s0517a17:5_14: ime tayo dhammā pubbabhāge uppannavivekānaṁ upanissayattā nissayā nāma. Keci pana
atk-s0517a17:5_15: ‘‘cittañcassa svādhiṭṭhitanti samādhi vutto’’ti vadanti. Virāgādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0517a17:6_0: Nirodhavāre pana nirodhasaddato aññaṁ pariyāyavacanaṁ dassentena amatā dhātūti vuttaṁ,
atk-s0517a17:6_1: sesesu nirodho nibbānanti ubhayatthāpi nibbānameva. Dvādasa nissayāti chandasaddhācittāniyeva
atk-s0517a17:6_2: vivekādīsu catūsu ekekasmiṁ tayo tayo katvā dvādasa nissayā honti.
atk-s0517a17:7_0: 25. Sammāsaṅkappavāyāmasatisamādhīnampi imināva nayena atthayojanā veditabbā. Sammāvācākammantā
atk-s0517a17:7_1: jīvānaṁ pana jhānakkhaṇe vipassanākkhaṇe ca abhāvā jhānavipassanānaṁ pubbabhāgaparabhāgavasena
atk-s0517a17:7_2: vattamānā viratiyo jhānavipassanā sannissitā katvā vuttāti veditabbaṁ. Nīvaraṇānaṁ
atk-s0517a17:7_3: diṭṭhigatānañca vivekavirāganirodhapaṭinissaggā tathā pavattamānānaṁ viratīnaṁ vivekādayo
atk-s0517a17:7_4: nāmāti veditabbaṁ. Yathā aṭṭhakanipāte ‘‘tato, tvaṁ bhikkhu, imaṁ samādhiṁ savitakkaṁ
atk-s0517a17:7_5: savicārampi bhāveyyāsi, avitakkavicāramattampi bhāveyyāsi, avitakkaṁ avicārampi bhāveyyāsi,
atk-s0517a17:7_6: sappītikampi bhāveyyāsi, nippītikampi bhāveyyāsi, sātasahagatampi bhāveyyāsi, upekkhāsahagatampi
atk-s0517a17:7_7: bhāveyyāsī’’ti (a. ni. 8.63) mettādayo kāyānupassanādayo ca niyakajjhattamūlasamādhivasena
atk-s0517a17:7_8: catukkapañcakajjhānikā viya vuttā, evamidhāpi pubbabhāgaparabhāgavasena viratiyo
atk-s0517a17:7_9: vuttāti veditabbaṁ. Byañjanacchāyamattaṁ gahetvā na bhagavā abbhācikkhitabbo. Gambhīrañhi
